question.question: What is typically visible on a radiography of the pelvis in cases of microcrystalline arthropathies?
question.option_a: Calcifications of the pubic symphysis and femoral bone
question.option_b: Calcifications of the pubic symphysis and femoral cartilages
question.option_c: Calcifications of the femoral bone and hip joint
question.option_d: Calcifications of the pubic bone and sacroiliac joint
